prestigeSelect.name: Prestige Select Beverage Package
includes: All non-alcoholic beverages (already included in fare)

_notes.source: cruisediscover.com, cruisesolutioner.com, oceaniacruises.com, thepointsguy.com, theluxurycruisereview.com, cruisecritic.com — verified 2026-01-31
_notes.itemSources: Beer $5-$8 range, Budweiser $6.50/Corona $7.50/Heineken $7.50 (CruiseDiscover). Wine $8-$16/glass, standard $10 (CruiseDiscover). Cocktails $10-$15 standard, Margarita/Mai Tai $11-$11.25 (CruiseDiscover, Oceania official bar menu PDF). Spirits $11.50 standard vodka martini/$12-$13 premium (CruiseDiscover Martinis Bar). Mocktails $12 (ThePointsGuy). Energy $5 est. Soda/coffee/tea/juice/water/smoothies all FREE under Your World Included (Jan 2025, oceaniacruises.com). Evian/Perrier premium water NOT included.
_notes.apples_to_apples: Oceania Your World Included (Jan 2025): soda, specialty coffee, tea, fresh juice, smoothies, Vero water all complimentary. Alcohol is à la carte or via Prestige Select package. Gratuities included in package. House Select package no longer sold separately.
